situation: chatting at BTJTIS' house
classification: Jakarta Indonesian
description: Betawi is the indigenous Malay dialect of Jakarta. The speakers were formed from the mixing of ethnicities coming to Jakarta during Dutch colonial times. The inflows were adequately gradual to let the constant stream of immigrants be absorbed into a distinct ethnic group. This ethnic group speaks with their own dialect called Betawi Malay which is different from other dialects of Malay. Nowadays it is only spoken by older people in certain villages on the outskirts of the city. The younger generation tends to speak Jakarta Indonesian.  The project was started in June 2004. There have been twelve recordings which are collected randomly from the speakers who live or have lived in some regions in Jakarta. The regions are Kampung Melayu, Pasar Rebo, Pondok Gede, Ulujami, and Jagakarsa. Most of the regions, except Kampung Melayu, are situated on the outskirts of Jakarta. Pasar Rebo is situated at the very southeast edge of Jakarta, bordering Bogor, West Java. Pondok Gede is also situated at the very southeast edge of Jakarta, bordering Bekasi and Bogor, West Java. Ulujami is situated in South Jakarta, bordering Banten, West Java and Jagakarsa is situated in South Jakarta, bordering Depok, West Java. There are around fifteen native speakers from the total recordings, the speakers are above thirty years old. They still speak with a deep Betawi accent. The rest of the speakers are from younger generation and other ethnicities. For future plan, more recordings will be done with the native speakers from other areas of Jakarta.

Pasar Rebo is situated at the very southeast edge of Jakarta, bordering Bogor, West Java. Pondok Gede is also situated at the very southeast edge of Jakarta, bordering Bekasi and Bogor, West Java. Ulujami is situated in South Jakarta, bordering Banten, West Java and Jagakarsa is situated in South Jakarta, bordering Depok, West Java. There are around fifteen native speakers from the total recordings, the speakers are above thirty years old. They still speak with a deep Betawi accent. The rest of the speakers are from younger generation and other ethnicities. For future plan, more recordings will be done with the native speakers from other areas of Jakarta.

situation: Ardy's description: "ini salah satu bahasa di Kecamatan Simpang Dua, dulu Simpang Dua menjadi satu Dengan Kecamatan Simpang Hulu kecamatan di mana aku tinggal, sekarang kecamatan dibagi dua. Jadi, bahasa Simpang sekarang terletak di Kecamatan Simpang Dua dan Bahasa Goray ada di situ dan satu-satunya bahasa yang berbeda diantara semua dialect Simpang, berbatasan dengan Kecamatan Sungai Laur, jadi bahasa ini lebih mirip dengan bahasa yang ada di Sungai Laur."

situation: Menceritakan tentang si Kancil dan si Kerbau. Direkam pada sore hari di rumah Yuka. Elian merekam suara di tepi jalan karena rumahnya Yuka berdekatan dengan jalan. (The story is about a mousedeer and a buffalo. This is recorded in Yuka's house in the late afternoon. Elian recorded it on the side of the road because Yuka's house is near the road).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: direkam pada sore hari di rumah Elian, Dengan suasana lumayan tenang, Menceritakan tentang kisah tua-tua dulu tentang suami-isteri. (This is recorded in Elian's house in the late afternoon in a calm situation. It tells an old story about husband and wife).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: rekaman ini direkam di rumah Rosminar, pada sore hari. Rekaman ini mencerikan tentang cerita rakyat "Puti Nisa" yang tidak ada kegiatannya dan dia hanya mencari/menyisir kutu terus menerus dan cerita ini mengajarkan untuk sayang kepada anak kita sendiri apapun kekurangannya.(This recording is recorded in Rosminar's house in the late afternoon. This recording tells a story about "Puti Nisa" who does not have any activities and she only looks for/combs for head lice again and again. This story teaches us to love our own children, despite of their weakness).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: direkam pada sore hari di rumah Rozi. Tapi banyak pendengarnya. Menceritakan cerita rakyat tentang "harimau dengan racun". Hanya Dona yang bisa kerasukan harimau, keluarga Dona dulunya pernah bermasalah dengan hantu pemegang racun tersebut. Harimau dengan hantu tersebut memang tidak akur dari dulu. (This is recorded in Rozi's house in the late afternoon, but there are a lot of audience. It tells a folktalke about "a tiger and poison". Only Dona who can be possessed by a tiger, Dona's family has had a problem with the ghost who has the poison. The tiger and the ghost do not get along well since a long time ago).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: direkam pada sore hari di Padang, dengan suasana lumayan aman tapi ada suara handphone sedikit. Mereka Saling berbagi cerita dan curahan hati, menceritakan masa-masa lalu, tentang percintaan mereka, waktu masa-masa sekolah (This is recorded in Padang in the late afternoon. The situation is quite okay but there are some sounds from handphone.They share stories, tells a story about the old time, a story about their love,  and a story about time when they're still in school).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: direkam pada sore hari di pulau tengah. Ibu Yurhana menceritakan tentang dua kakak beradik yang nakal serta menceritakan tentang "tinggilah batu sampai ke langit". (This is recorded in Pulau Tengah in the late afternoon. Mrs. Yurhana tells a story about naughty siblings and also a story about "the rock is high, (it reaches) the sky").
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang nenek dan cucu yang berternak ayam dan cerita tentang suami istri yang tidak direstui. Direkam pada sore hari. (A folktale about a grandpa and a grandchild who raise chickens and a story about a husband and wife who are not approved (to get married)).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang sahabat-sahabat Elian dan masalah pribadi. direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana tenang. menceritakan tentang sahabat-sahabat Elian dan masalah pribadi. direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana tenang. (This tells a story about Elian's friends and personal problems. It's recorded at night in a calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang orang kerdil berkaki terbalik dan menceritakan tentang orang adat, direkam pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about a dwarf with reversed legs and a story about indigenous people. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang nenek dan kakeknya Hatmawati dan juga tentang pernikahan Elian. Diceritakan pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah pak Nurdin. (This tells a story about Hatmawati's grandma and grandpa and also about Elian's wedding. It's told in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation in Mr. Nurdin's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang asal usul manusia harimau. Diceritakan pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about the origin of tiger man. It's told in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: Menceritakan acara-acara adat di Pulau Tengah dan juga menceritakan tentang seorang pendekar dari Pulau Tengah. Direkam pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about traditional ceremonies in Pulau Tengah and also tells a story about a swordsman from Pulau Tengah. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang asal usul Pulau Tengah dengan menceritakan bahwa nenek moyangnya yang menikah dengan harimau. Direkam pada sore hari dengan keadaan lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about the origin of Pulau Tengah and tells a story about an ancestor who gets married with a tiger. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang salah satu kawannya yang sudah menikah dan mereka saling curhat masalah persahabatan. Direkam pada malam hari dengan keadaan sepi di pematang sawah. (This tells a story about one's friend who is married and they shares their friendship problems. It's recorded at night in a quiet situation in a rice field).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang kekasih mereka (Fadli, Reska, dan Elian) dan percakapan sehari-hari. Direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana yang lumayan nyaman di pematang sawah. bercerita tentang kekasih mereka (Fadli, Reska, dan Elian) dan percakapan sehari-hari. Direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana yang lumayan nyaman di pematang sawah. (It tells a story about their girlfriends (Fadli, Reska, and Elian's girlfriends) and daily conversation. It's recorded at night in a quite comfortable situation in a rice field).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang budaya Pulau Tengah dan obat-obatan tradisional di Pulau Tengah. Direkam pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about Pulau Tengah's culture and traditional medicine in Pulau Tengah. It's recorded in the late afternoonin a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang para pahlawan Pulau Tengah dan kejadian-kejadian aneh, diceritakan pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah pak Zainun. (This tells a story about the heroes of Pulau Tengah and strange incidents. It's told in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation in Mr. Zainun's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang cita-cita Fadli, Reska, Hendrianto, dan Elian dan percakapan sehari-hari, direkam pada malam hari dengan keadaan sepi. (This tells a story about Fadli. Reska, Hendrianto, and Elian's goals and daily conversation. It's recorded at night in a quiet situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: Menceritakan tentang penjajahan di Kerinci Pulau Tengah direkam pada sore hari dengan keadaan lumayan tenang. (This tells a story of colonialism in Kerinci, Pulau Tengah. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan keunikan obat-obatan tradisional. Direkam pada malam hari dengan keadaan lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about the uniqeness of traditional medicine. It's recorded at night in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang keadaan di Pulau Tengah dan menceritakan tentang lapangan futsal. Direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah pak Surjat. (This tells a story about the situation in Pulau Tengah and a story about futsal field. It's recorded at night in a quite calm situation in Mr. Surjat's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang percintaan dan saling melepaskan curahan hati mereka. Direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana yang lumayan nyaman di pematang sawah. (This tells a story about love and their sharing (about their problems). It's recorded at night in a quite comfortable situation in a rice field).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang acara pernikahan dan juga tentang arwah yang bisa mengobatin demam dan kelilipan, direkan pada sore hari dengan keadaan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about a wedding and also about a ghost who can cure a fever and (people who) get something in the eye. It is recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang buka usaha jualan, diceritakan pada sore hari dengan suasana yang lumayan tenang di rumah pak Heri. (This tells a story about starting trading. It's told in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation in Mr. Heri's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang si kerbau beranak manusia kembar, direkam pada sore hari di tempat lumayan tenang di rumah pak Guntur. (A folktale about a buffalo who gives birth to human twins. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm place, in Mr. Guntur's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang si Puteri yang berbisa. Si Putri menikah dengan seorang ustad. Direkam pada siang hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah pak Nurdin. (A folktale about a venomous princess. The princess gets married to a Islamic preacher. It's recorded in the afternoon in a quite calm situation in Mr. Nurdin's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang kepintaran si Mapatau untuk mendapatkan anak orang kaya dan cerita rakyat tentang kancil dan monyet. Diceritakan pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah Hendrip. (A folktale about the cleverness of Mapatau to get (married to) a rich person's child and a folktale about a mousedeer and a monkey. It's told in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation in Hendrip's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: Dalam rekaman ini terdapat empat buah cerita rakyat, tapi hanya diceritakan secara singkat. yang pertama tentang "Putri yang terbuang", yang kedua tentang "ular besar" penghuni Pulau Tengah. yang ketiga cerita rakyat tentang "si kerbau bertarung dengan si burung" dan yang keempat cerita rakyat tentang ayah Ande dengan ibu Ande. Direkam pada sore hari bertempat yang lumayan tenang di rumah pak Nurdin. (This recording has four folktales but the stories are told shortly. The first one is about "The banished princess". The second one is about "A big snake" which is the habitant of Pulau Tengah. The third folktale is about "a buffalo who fights a bird" and the forth one is about Ande's mom and dad. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm place in Mr. Nurdin's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang si Mapatau. Direkam pada sore hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah pak Nurdin. (A folktale about Mapatau. It's recorded in the late afternoon in a quite calm situation in Mr. Nurdin's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang Putri desa dengan Putri hutan yang diceritakan pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about the village princess and the forest princess. It's told at night in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang tiga bersaudara yang hidup tanpa orang tua dan salah satu dari mereka ada yang menikah dengan anak tuan raja, direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (A folktale about three siblings who live without parents and one of them is married to the king's child. It's recorded at night in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang manusia yang berubah menjadi binatang. Direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang di rumah neneknya Popi. (A folktale about a human who can turn into an animal. It's recorded at night in a quite calm situation in the house of Popi's grandma).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang memfitnahkan kakak iparnya sendiri. Direkam pada sore hari dengan suasana yang nyaman dan tenang di rumah neneknya Popi. (The folklore is about someone who slenders his own sister in-law. It is recorded in the late afternoon in a comfortable and calm situation at the house of Popi's grandma).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang keluarga monyet mencuri di ladangnya tuan raja direkam pada malam hari dirumahnya Nizarti suasananya lumayan tenang. (A folktale about a monkey family which steals things in the king's field. It's recorded at night in Nizarti's house. The situation is quite calm).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat tentang dua bersaudara  dan salah satu dari mereka ada yang menikah dengan hantu air direkam pada sore hari dirumah nizarti dengan suasana keramaian karena banyak yang ingin mendengarkan ceritanya. (A folktale about two siblings and one of them is married to a water ghost. It's recorded in the late afternoon in Nizarti's house in a crowded situation because many people want to hear the story).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: bercerita tentang kejadian di pulau Tengah dan ada dua cerita rakyat tapi ceritanya secara singkat tentang orang yang pertama menemukan Pulau Tengah dan cerita sang anak tertinggal di hutan, cerita ini direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan nyaman, bertempat di Padang. (This tells a story about an incident in Pulau Tengah and two folktales but the stories are short, a story about the first person who discovers Pulau Tengah and a story about a child who is left in a forest. These stories are recorded at night in a quite comfortable situation in Padang).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: ada dua cerita rakyat tentang monyet yang pintar dan tentang manusia menikah dengan raja ular direkam pada malam hari dengan suasana lumayan tenang, bertempat merekamnya di Padang. (There are two folktales about a smart monkey and about a human who is married to the snake king. It's recorded at night in a quite calm situation. The place where it's recorded is in Padang).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: menceritakan tentang kejadian makhluk halus yang pernah di temukan dan tempat kejadian yang angker diceritakan pada malam hari di kota Padang dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (This tells a story about an incident of ghost which has been found and a haunted place where it happens. It's told at night in Padang in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat yang menceritakan tentang dua bersaudara yang hidup susah tanpa orang tua dibenci masyarakat dan mereka berdua tinggal dihutan sesampai dihutan diganggu lagi sama hantu besar, diceritakan pada sore hari di rumah Nizarti dengan suasana lumayan tenang. (A folktale about two siblings who live poorly without parents, are hated by the society, and both of them live in the forest. When they're in the forest, they are also disturbed by a big ghost. It's told in the late afternoon in Nizarti's house in a quite calm situation).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: cerita rakyat menceritakan tentang ayam dengan burung elang dan ayam dengan musang diceritakan oleh Popi Minhalizar dengan suasana lumayan tenang direkam pada sore hari dirumah Nizarti. (The folklore is about a chicken and an eagle as well as a chicken and a weasel. It is told by Popi Minhalizar in a calm situation. It is recorded in the late afternoon in Nizarti's house).
classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

classification: Kerinci (various dialects)
description: A corpus of naturalistic speech from the Pulau Tengah dialect of Kerinci.

situation: This is a conversation at Hengky's grandmother's house in Pagaralam, in which  Hengky questions his grandmother about what it was like when she was younger before she was married. Even though this conversation takes place in Pagaralam, it is all in Besemah and not in the koine of Pagaralam.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

situation: This is a conversation at Satri's house (next to Hengky's house) in Pagaralam at about 8pm. All speakers aside from Hengky, now live in Pagaralam. Furthermore, all speakers are from the village of Pelajaran, except for Bani who is from East Java (who has lived in Pagaralam for at least 10 years.)
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

situation: This is a conversation at Azwar's house in Pagaralam that took place at 10am. Azwar and Dian are both from Pagaralam and altough they are native Besemah speakers, this is a conversation uses the koine of Pagaralam.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

situation: This is a conversation that takes place at Armawi's house in Pelajaran. All speakers aside from Hengky, Dian and Azwar currenlty live in Pelajaran. Dian and Azwar currenlty live in Pagaralam.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

situation: A conversation at Yanuari's rice paddy in the village of Jambat Akar. All speakers are from Gunung Agung, which is about 20 minutes from Jambat Akar. This is mostly free conversation, except for a small part, in which Yanuari shares the traditional story of Radin Suane.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

situation: The conversation took place at Apan's house in Jambat Akar. All speakers aside from Hengky currently live in Jambat Akar.

classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)

description: Langkat Malay is spoken in Langkat regency, North Sumatra

location: Kampung Hinai Kanan, Tanjung Pura, Langkat
situation: ZAE, DAL and SYA are visiting the oldest woman in Hinai village, Siti Aminah. They have a long conversation with Siti's daughter Absah and her daughters Farida and Yuliana and son in law Rianto in the living room. In the same room they also are having lunch.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)
description: Langkat Malay is spoken in Langkat regency, North Sumatra

location: Kampung Hinai Kanan, Tanjung Pura, Langkat
situation: ZAE, DAL and SYA are visiting the oldest woman in Hinai Kanan Village, Siti Aminah in her house. ZAE, SYA and RIA are discussing about some Islamic religious issues in the living room; ZAE and SYA having a conversation with Siti Aminah (Andong) who is sick in her room at the backside of the house.
classification: Other Sumatra Malayic (Langkat, Tapan, Muko-Muko, Besemah, Sarang Lang, Bangka)
description: Langkat Malay is spoken in Langkat regency, North Sumatra

description: Sarang Lang is a Malay dialect related to Palembang Malay, spoken in one large village about 80 km southeast of the city of Palembang. Like the Palembang dialect, it shows very strong signs of an early Javanese influence. This influence manifests itself mostly in the lexicon, leading to the hypothesis that it is the result of a strong superstratum influence. A study of the village's oral history, as well as written sources, verify this. The village was apparently established as the fiefdom of a noble Javanese family from Palembang, and over time the Malay villagers adopted many lexical items from their Javanese overlords. The use of Javanese has long disappeared from the village, but its language is still peppered with hundreds, if not thousands of Javanese loanwords, including many core vocabulary items such as body parts and basic verbs.

description: Sarang Lang is a Malay dialect related to Palembang Malay, spoken in one large village about 80 km southeast of the city of Palembang. Like the Palembang dialect, it shows very strong signs of an early Javanese influence. This influence manifests itself mostly in the lexicon, leading to the hypothesis that it is the result of a strong superstratum influence. A study of the village's oral history, as well as written sources, verify this. The village was apparently established as the fiefdom of a noble Javanese family from Palembang, and over time the Malay villagers adopted many lexical items from their Javanese overlords. The use of Javanese has long disappeared from the village, but its language is still peppered with hundreds, if not thousands of Javanese loanwords, including many core vocabulary items such as body parts and basic verbs.

situation: talking in LIL’s car. First, there are only EXPLAN, LIL, and VIV. Later, LIFSD is joining in. They are on the way to a restaurant. During the recording, the radio is on--the sound from the radio is not coded.
classification: Other Western Varieties of Indonesian (Bandung, Tanggerang Chinese Malay, Padang)
description: Bandung is Indonesia's second largest city, but is also the capital of Priangan, the Sundanese speaking region of western Java. Practically all of its ethnic Sundanese inhabitants, as well as many members of the Chinese community and other long-term migrants, are bilingual in Sundanese and Indonesian. This has brought about a strong Sundanese influence on the variety of Indonesian spoken in the city. This variety seems to be closely related to Jakarta Indonesian, which also has significant Sundanese influence, but this influence is naturally much stronger in Bandung, and extends to the phonology, morphology, and syntax, as well as the lexicon.

location: Balai Berkuak, deretan perumahan lama di kampung lama Balaiberkuak.
situation: Rekaman diambil di rumah informan, ULS (Ulis), di Balai Berkuak. letak rumahnya di jalan alternatif di ujung kampung. walau banyak perubahan yang terjadi di Balai Berkuak dengan banyaknya pembangunan jalan dan bangunan, tapi di bagian di mana rumah ULS didirikan suasannya masih seperti semula. saat proses rekaman berlangsung dia sedang menidurkan anaknya, jadi bersuara tidak terlalu keras karena kawatir anaknya terbangun. jadi ada beberapa menit yang suara bicaranya sangat kecil.
classification: West Kalimantan Malayic (Balai Berkuak, Sambas, Pontianak Malay)

location: Balai Berkuak, jauh di pinggiran kota Balaiberkuak.
situation: Situation; Rekaman diambil di rumah kediaman informan, di ujung pinggiran Desa Balai Berkuak. dulunya BTL adalah teman EXPALG semasa kecil sejak duduk di sekolah dasar. bahasa malayu yang dipergunakannya murni Bahasa melayu Balai, sedikitpun tidak tercampur dengan bahasa Indonesia atau bahasa luar. Hanya saja ada selipan bahasa dayak Kualan dalam obrolan. ayahnya dulu adalah merupakan generasi keturunan dari keluarga kerajaan melayu di daerah Tayan. jadi, sejak jaman Belanda kerajaan melayu dihapus dan banyak kerabat istana kerajaan yang melarikan diri karena kawatir ditangkap.
classification: West Kalimantan Malayic (Balai Berkuak, Sambas, Pontianak Malay)
project_name: Languages of Western Borneo Documentation Project

location: Balai Berkuak, di tengah-tengah kota dekat jalan raya, di depan sebuah sekolah dasar negeri.
